main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

messageReadyForPickup

public void messageReadyForPickup(JEdPoint.JEdPointModule jedpointModule)
Informs JEdPoint that jedpointModule has messages queued. JEdPoint will then pick the messages up, route them and then return them via the source module's processMessage.

routeMessage

public JEdPoint.JEdPointMessage routeMessage(int moduleToSendTo,
                                             int messageType,
                                             JEdPoint.JEdPointMessage JPM)
Routes the message to the correct module(s).

Will return only when the destination module returns.
